subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox became the first team in the major leagues to clinch a playoff spot this season, rallying on ninth-inning home runs by Jason Varitek and Julio Lugo last night to beat the host Tampa Bay Devil Rays, 8-6.
snippet: The Red Sox became the first team in the major leagues to clinch a playoff spot this season, rallying on ninth-inning home runs by Jason Varitek and Julio Lugo last night to beat the host Tampa Bay Devil Rays, 8-6.
